title: GET_PLAYER_TOKEN
content:
0x54C06897// GetPlayerToken
char* GET_PLAYER_TOKEN(char* playerSrc, int index);Parameters:playerSrc: A player.index: Index between 0 and GET_NUM_PLAYER_TOKENS.Returns: A token value.Gets a player's token. Tokens can be used to enhance banning logic, however are specific to a server.
codeBlocks:
// GetPlayerToken
char* GET_PLAYER_TOKEN(char* playerSrc, int index);
